result.arabic_text: هُنَالِكَ دَعَا زَكَرِيَّا رَبَّهُۥۖ قَالَ رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةٗ طَيِّبَةًۖ إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ ٱلدُّعَآءِ
result.translation: 38.Too waqdi Nabii Zakariyya Yalli Maryam isi Rizqhik edde konnabisem yuble waqdi, isi Rabbi xaaqeeh Yi-Rabbow isi xaquk meqe Samaday (Raddi) Barkat-le yoh Acuy, Diggah Atu koo xaaqe marih xaaqo yaabbi kinnitok iyye.
